entry.data:
CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 50S
SOUTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 80S
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 60S
SOUTHEAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY SUNNY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE EVENING, THEN SHOWERS LIKELY AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE MID 60S
SOUTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 60 PERCENT

SHOWERS LIKELY IN THE MORNING, THEN PARTLY SUNNY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 70S

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 50S
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S
